trans-unit.source: Implements an underlying type cache for all <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref> derived types.
DependencyObjectType represents a specific underlying system ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]) <xref:System.Type> of a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>.
DependencyObjectType is essentially a wrapper for the ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]) <xref:System.Type> so that it can extend some of its capabilities.
This class has no public constructor.

Instances of this class can only be obtained through properties on other objects (such as <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.DependencyObjectType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>), or through the static method <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType.FromSystemType%2A>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref> of the immediate base class of the current <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref>.
The type of the base class.
Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref> that represents a given system ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]) type.

Each <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> maintains a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.DependencyObjectType%2A> property that returns a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType>, but this requires having a particular <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> instance.
You can use this static utility method if you do not yet have a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> instance and require a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType>.
The system ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]) type to convert.
A <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref> that represents the system ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]) type.
Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref>.
This implementation is linked to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType.Id%2A> property.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
Gets a zero-based unique identifier for constant-time array lookup operations.
Do not use for general hashing functions.
There is no guarantee on this value.
It can vary between application runs.
An internal identifier.
Determines whether the specified object is an instance of the current <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref>.
Objects of the exact same type return `true`.
The object to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref>.
if the class represented by the current is in the inheritance hierarchy of the passed as d; otherwise, .
Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref> derives from the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref> to compare.
if the dependencyObjectType parameter and the current represent types of classes, and the class represented by the current derives from the class represented by dependencyObjectType.
Otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
This method also returns if dependencyObjectType and the current represent the same class.
Gets the name of the represented [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] system type.
The value of Name is the same string as the name of the type name of the <xref:System.Type>.
The name of the represented [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] system type.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] system type represented by this <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref>.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] system type represented by this <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref>.
